article_title: SNCF’s Geodis ‘Very Open’ to German Acquisitions, FAZ Reports
article_text: SHARE THIS ARTICLE   Share   Tweet   Post   Email  {"contentId":"LNFPY40YHQ0X01","position":"brokerboxarticle","dimensions":{"large_desktop":[[120,60]],"small_desktop":[[120,60]],"tablet":[[120,60]]},"strategy":"viewable","positionIncrement":1,"targeting":{"position":"brokerboxarticle1","url":"/news/articles/2011-06-27/sncf-s-geodis-very-open-to-german-acquisitions-faz-reports"},"containerId":"brokerboxarticle-mSvp7ay"}   Societe Nationale des Chemins de Fer Francais, France’s state-owned rail company, is seeking acquisitions to expand its Geodis freight and logistics unit in Germany, the Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung reported, citing an interview with Pierre Blayau, who heads the unit.    SNCF needs a bigger presence in the German market to link customers in France with eastern and northern Europe and is “very open” to deals, the newspaper quoted Blayau as saying.     Published on ‎27‎ ‎June‎, ‎2011‎ ‎08‎:‎04        Have a confidential tip for our reporters? GET IN TOUCH    Before it's here, it's on the Bloomberg Terminal.
